item.title: American Hospital Association
item.description:
American Hospital Association
Image
admin Tue, 07/23/2024 - 18:25

Pay-by-search product

 

 

The AHA Coding Clinic Advisor project focused on rebranding the site and making it more approachable for users. We focused on the frontend changes by creating a new design, and applying it in the creation of a new homepage, and blog post pages.

 

In the backend, we created a newsletter implementation and updated functionality for certain components on the site. Project is still ongoing.

Key elements
  • Maintenance work
  • Website redesign
  • New integrations
  • New custom features

item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Sjogren’s Foundation
item.description:
Sjogren’s Foundation
Image
admin Mon, 05/06/2024 - 20:08

Update and Maintenance

Sjogren’s Foundation was in need of a Drupal update and some key features for the site. During the transition from Drupal 8 to Drupal 10, there were many difficulties that had to do a lot with undoing confusing code and not good practice code from previous developers. To fix these issues, we did a lot of testing and made careful and thoughtful changes. 

 

The site is stable now and we’ve moved from maintenance to working on new features for the site. Our work to refactor and update build customer trust and offered the opportunity to start work on many new features.

During the transition from Drupal 8 to Drupal 10, there were many difficulties that had to do a lot with undoing confusing code and not good practice code from previous developers. To fix these issues, we did a lot of testing and made careful and thoughtful changes.

 

 

 

Key elements
  • Maintenance work
  • Website redesign
  • New integrations
  • New custom features
